api_list.name: Rapid API of Dung Bui End Point
POST getLiveVideoComments
api_list.description: Allows to retrive comments for live video.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dung-bui.p.rapidapi.comgetLiveVideoComments"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dung-bui.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
